channel.title: Npcs
channel.description: How you make npcs walk around..:???? Any1 got a tut onm it

item.title: Npcs
item.dc:creator: @newservermaker newservermaker
item.description:
@newservermaker wrote:

in the autospawn.cfg file you see something like this:

//------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption spawn = 3782 2802 2592 0 0 0 0 0 0 Void knight spawn = 649 2795 3062 0 0 0 0 0 0 Online Dude spawn = 649 2809 3185 0 0 0 0 0 0 Online Dude spawn = 649 2801 3177 0 0 0 0 0 0 Online Dude

change the

	0	0	0	0	0	0

also these r the

Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType

just change the

RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType

to the coords you want it moving to. the x1 is the northX coord and the x2 is the southX coord. same with the y1 and y2
hope i helped

Read full topic
